It proves that the cochinita pibil is soft and tender, and cut be cut with a plate. Tradition. Although we have a similar tradition in the Philippines, where Bulacan is another province has a restaurant that serves lechon that is roasted then cut with a ceramic white paper plate to cut and divide into many pieces. So yes, this practice is universal between Mexico and the Philippines. It means the lechon has a crispy skin and the meat is moist and tender. Yummy!
title: Chopping up a cochinito (某种烤乳猪) with a plate
